channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 24th July
item.description:
Hi, thank you for arranging to have the fly-tipping cleared yesterday — I really appreciate the quick response. Unfortunately, more fly-tipping has occurred again today. I just wanted to make you aware.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camberwell Road, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling, 24th July
item.description:
Dog fouling please clean

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clevedon Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No disabled wheelchair or mobility scooter access ramp on steps, 24th July
item.description:
Disabled parent with Alzheimer’s has a mobility scooter and can only safely exit his house Via the steps at the top of mountview road BR6 0hw they live at no 40 and on a 1/4 hill which isn’t safe to go down in his mobility scooter and unable to walk down or up the only other option are the steps at the top of the cul de sac leading to the footpath to poverest park/Footbury Hill this currently has No disabled wheelchair or mobility scooter access ramp on steps which is required so he can leave the house safely without the ramp he is technically house bound, although he currently has a car due to his Alzheimer’s disease this will not be the case in the near future so ramp required for mobility scooter on part of the steps

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mountview Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Door Entry System, 24th July
item.description:
Door entry system has developed a fault. The issue has been reported by phone, and a date has been for an engineer call. Monday 28th July, is it possible to bring this forward, as the internal phone beeps almost constantly throughout the day and night.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Springfield, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 21-23-25-27-29 Evering road, 24th July
item.description:
They are not following the guidelines for rubbish disposal. They’re leaving out black bags that are either not properly sealed or left out on the wrong days. This lead to severe hygiene issues, including infestations of maggots and unpleasant smell

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rectory Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
